description:
Frederik Pohl & C.M. Kornbluth  - The Merchants' War (The Space Merchants #2)


The witty sequel to Frederik Pohl's & C. M. Kornbluth's legendary science fiction classic The Space Merchants, written 30 years later.

Great advertising agencies still dominate the world and control all governments and every aspect of human behavior.
